alerts.benefits: Installing the app gives you faster access, offline functionality, and push notifications for important updates.
alerts.troubleshooting: If you don't see install options, try refreshing the page or using a supported browser like Chrome or Safari.

instructions.title: Install on {{device}}

iosSafari: Tap the Share button (square with arrow) at the bottom
Scroll down and tap "Add to Home Screen"
androidChrome: Tap the three-dot menu in the top right
desktopChrome: Click the install icon in the address bar
Or go to Chrome menu â†’ "Install LegacyGuard"
